channel.title: Game Jam on Hanif012
channel.description: Recent content in Game Jam on Hanif012

item.title: Lore's Quests
item.description: I trained Nicholas D for game designer roles, game programing by Steven W and George M, assets by Kevin Adi About the Game # Lore’s Quests is a simple and lighthearted 2D ragdoll physics game in which you play as a jester trying to entertain and pander to each and every whim of the King Lore-Lore in order to stay alive.

item.title: No Time To Waste
item.description: Designed by me, programmed by M Kevin, assets by Kevin Adi About the Game # Job simulator game where you play as T0-N0, an early prototype robot in the AI Robot Industry Revolution of 2045.
